job description:
Overview
The Data Specialist within the Supply Chain provides comprehensive data analytics and data collection support to Supply Chain teams as part of daily/weekly/month data reporting of business metrics and for continuous improvement projects. These duties include,but are not limited to running reports on a daily basis and data entry of output metrics, distribution of reports to leadership, key stakeholders, and project leaders to ensure projects have reliable, actionable process data.
Responsibilities
  • Runs and updates new and existing reports to support continuous improvement and special projects within the Supply Chain
  • Distributes high quality (accurate and timely) reports and data on a daily/weekly/monthly basis
  • Provides a high level of service for internal and external customers
  • Triages, troubleshoots and resolves incidents and problems as assigned
  • Executes tasks and manages processes according to established procedures
  • Ensures consistent reporting quality through the testing and evaluation of data quality from reports
  • May assist in continuous improvement projects to enhance their understanding of Supply Chain processes
  • Completes work efficiently with high quality and high customer satisfaction with little work direction
  • Meets customer requirements and deadlines with all deliverables, projects, tasks and activities
  • Identifies and resolves issues that may arise that hinders their ability to complete tasks in a timely manner
Qualifications
Experience, Education & Certifications:
  • Bachelors degree or equivalent
  • 1-3 years industry experience in a business or technology function
  • Strong analytical skills, problem solving mindset, and technical aptitude
  • Expertise in Microsoft Office and collaboration tools
  • Experience using CRM or ERP systems such as Oracle, Siebel, BI helpful
Knowledge, skills & abilities:
  • Ability to organize, prioritize work, meet deadlines, and complete deliverables
  • Ability to handle multiple tasks and activities in a timely, organized manner
  • Requires technical skills appropriate to the position
  • Requires strong oral and written communication skills
  • Must be a strong team player
